title: SMS does not send. Voice calls are broken/intermittent
content:
I have to reset the phone a couple of times a week because SMS won't send.

Voice calls are frequently broken up. I can hear fine but the user at the other end can't here me. I haven't found a mitigation for this other than switching to my other mobile (iphone).
Phone usage is in the metropolitan Brisbane (Australia) area.

How can I resolve or troubleshoot.
